version_description:
Thanks for sending in your suggestions! We've added a bit of oil to keep the trimmer running smoothly :)
- We'll now ask less often if you like the app
- Fixed a problem where the vibration effect would sometimes stop
- Coming soon: customize your trimmer!

Thanks for shaving with us! Already 260.000 pranks were pulled using this app!
- now itâ€™s more than a trimmer! unlock various items including a chainsaw, metal detector, taser and even a zombie!
- customize the device color, background and sound!
- improved experience on iPad: the front camera is used to play realistic cutting sounds when it touches hair
- enable or disable the vibration effect (iPhone only)
- added language support for: Chinese, Spanish, French, German, Dutch

- UI adjusted for iPhone X
- bugfixes

- improved vibration behavior for certain iPhones
- UI adjusted for iPhone X
- bugfixes

- improved vibration behavior for certain iPhones
- UI adjusted for iPhone X
- bugfixes

- UI adjusted for iPhone X
- bugfixes

- new "more apps" screen
- added privacy setting for EU GDPR compliance
- other small improvements and fixes

- fixed an issue where banners would still remain on screen after purchasing the in-app purchase
- fixed crashes
- new "more apps" screen
- added privacy setting and new policy for EU GDPR compliance
- other small improvements

- Now you can unlock items by watching a sponsored video.
- Improved vibration pattern

- Fixed vibration on some devices
- Fixed camera not responding to proximity on iPad

What was new in v1.5
- Now you can unlock items by watching a sponsored video.
- Improved vibration pattern

- New menu button to send feedback
- Other small improvements

- Fixed an issue where ads were still displayed after purchasing "Unlock everything"
- Fixed the app being stuck on "Loading" in some cases
- improved vibration effect for newest iPhones

- New main menu and settings screen
- Bug fixes and performance improvements
